column4: i installed compiz and then removed it via synaptic but now whenever i open any program, it doesnt have a titlebat and the window is "pinned" to the top if the screen. has anyone else had this problem ? how can i fix it ?
why did you install/remove it?   try running 'metacity --replace' if you can
you are using gnome? kubuntu? ubuntu? what exazctly?
so you are using xfce now then?
